name: Lost Bells
description:
Lost Bells was built as an Arcade game to be played on Lythbound. Your score will fail to send when playing the game here. Please play at Lythbound.com for your score to count in our high score table!

Additionally, games on Lythbound will receive updates before games on Itch. Please be aware this may not be the most recent version!

✦ Use your keyboard arrow keys, keyboard AWSD keys, or swipe in a direction to move the tiles across the board.

✦ Combine tiles of the same number to create a single tile of a higher number — your goal is the number 2048!

✦ Filling the board so that there are no possible tile combinations will end the game.

[ ]enters fullscreen mode (recommended for mobile). ][ leaves fullscreen mode.
